workspace_participation_certificate: Certificate of participation in a workspace
workspace_participation_certificate_desc: Template used to generate certificates of participation for users
workspace_success_certificate: Certificate of achievement in a workspace
workspace_success_certificate_desc: Template used to generate certificates of achievement for users.
evaluation_status: Status of the evaluation (Not attempted, In progress, Success, etc.)
evaluation_datetime: Last activity date of the evaluation (Date + Time)
evaluation_date: Last activity date of the evaluation (Date only)
evaluation_time: Last activity date of the evaluation (Time only)
